description: The Department of National Defence (DND) has a requirement for the establishment of a Regional Individual Standing Offer (RISO) for the provision of 3D print consumables for use with various make and models of 3D printers as and when requested, to the combat Training Centre (CTC) Tactics School, Army Learning Support Centre (ALSC), in Oromocto, New Brunswick. The RISO will be for a period of three (3) years, from March 01, 2024 to February 28, 2027.
full_summary:
Government of Canada
 Tender Announcement
 Confirmed - Multilingual

# Contract Title: W2037-240075 - 3D Print Consumables Regional Individual Standing Offer (RISO)
### Contract Reference Number
- Contract Reference Number: WS4365699399-Doc4414854374
- Solicitation Number: WS4365699399

### Brief Description
The Department of National Defence (DND) is soliciting a proposal for a Regional Individual Standing Offer (RISO) to provide 3D print consumables for use with various make and models of 3D printers as and when requested. 

### Detailed Description
The offer is to supply 3D print consumables for use by the Combat Training Centre (CTC) Tactics School, Army Learning Support Centre (ALSC), in Oromocto, New Brunswick. The period of the RISO will be three (3) years, from March 1, 2024 to February 28, 2027. There are no security requirements associated with this tender. 

### Contract Requirements
The tender description is available at URL: [https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/18630443?extsite=MTg2MzA0NDNfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==](https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/18630443?extsite=MTg2MzA0NDNfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==). 

### Business Requirements
- 3D print consumables for various make and models of 3D printers.
- Supply of consumables as and when requested by the Defence Minister of Canada, Department of National Defence (DND).
- Supply of consumables for a period of three (3) years from date of tender award.

### Requested Documents
The bidder must provide its own best Value for Money plan.

### Evaluation Criteria
A Contractor who submits an offer may be evaluated and selected for a RISO base on Lowest Price. 

### Inquires
Notice inquiries: None

### Language of Purchase
Official language of the proposal shall be in English and French. All documents that are part of this proposal will be provided in both the official language(s). Functioning in such, Bidders may access the, Department of National Defence (DND) documents contained in our documents section attached to this request.
